pages.title: Invisible to You
pages.text: While Riding a Chocobo, the chocobo will not get in your field of view.$(br)-aka, The Chocobo will not render locally for you while you're mounted & in first person view$(br)$(br)Chocobos will not 'Move' on their own while Mounted, but will Melee attack a target in melee range that you are attacking, or has attacked you or it.$(br)-Exception being other Chocobos you hit or hit you.  It maybe possible to get one to attack another, but given chocobos do not have ranged attacks... don't count on it.

pages.title: Side by Side
pages.text: The Chocobo will focus targets above following you
